GPS_TEC2HR_IGS.description: GPS-deduced 2-hour Total Electron Content (TEC) maps and movies, IGS= Average of 4 methods, incl. CODE= U Bern Switzerland, ESA= ESOC Darmstadt Germany, JPL= Jet Propulsion Lab. Pasadena USA, UPC= U Politec. Catalonia Barcelona Spain - International Global Navigation Satellite Systems (GNSS) Service Ionosphere Working Group
GPS_TEC2HR_IGS.pi_name: International Global Navigation Satellite Systems (GNSS) Service Ionosphere Working Group

GPS_RF_LANL-VTEC-1HR.description: LANL Gridded Vertical Total Electron Content (VTEC)

GPS_TEC15MIN_IGS.description: GPS-deduced 15-minute Total Electron Content (TEC) global maps and movies, UPC= U Politec. Catalonia Barcelona Spain - International Global Navigation Satellite Systems (GNSS) Service Iono Working Group
GPS_TEC15MIN_IGS.pi_name: International Global Navigation Satellite Systems (GNSS) Service Iono Working Group

GPS_TEC1HR_IGS.description: GPS-deduced 1-hour Total Electron Content (TEC) global maps and movies, UPC= U Politec. Catalonia Barcelona Spain, ESA= ESOC Darmstadt Germany (starting 20 Feb 2011)  - International Global Navigation Satellite Systems (GNSS) Service Ionosphere Working Group
GPS_TEC1HR_IGS.pi_name: International Global Navigation Satellite Systems (GNSS) Service Ionosphere Working Group

GPS_ROTI15MIN_JPL.description: GPS-deduced ROTI index: standard deviation of rate of change of Total Electron Content (TEC) in a 5 min interval every 15 min; world maps and movies - Xiaoqing Pi (Jet Propulsion Laboratory)
